bilingual.source: The two words then join together to make one word.
bilingual.target: 这两个单词然后合并成一个单词。

bilingual.source: I'm going to buy some word books.

bilingual.target: 不要停下来查每个单词。
我通过制作单词卡片学习。

bilingual.source: You don't have to understand every word.
Ask a volunteer to read out a word.
bilingual.target: 请一个志愿者读出一个单词。

bilingual.source: You don't need to understand every word.
bilingual.target: 你不需要理解每一个单词。

bilingual.source: Point to one flashcard and say the word.
bilingual.target: 指着一张单词卡片并说出这个词。

bilingual.source: Show how each word can be split up into syllables.
bilingual.target: 展示每个单词如何分成音节。

list.abstract: Microsoft Office Word是微软公司的一款文字处理应用程序，是常用办公软件之一，属于含有收费版权的应用程序。最初是由Richard Brodie为了运行DOS的IBM计算机而在1983年编写的，随后的版本可运行于Apple Macintosh（1984年）、SCO UNIX和Microsoft Windows（1989年），并成为了Microsoft Office的一部分。该软件可在电脑、Mac或移动设备上使用。 该软件一般随Microsoft Office软件包整体安装，有Microsoft 365专属Word、Word网页版、Word2021、Word2019等多个版本，高版本程序具有向下兼容的特性。该软件主要用于文本内容编辑、文件管理等，可使用20多种语言写作，具有设置文本格式、页面和布局、保存并打印、修订审阅等功能，还可以与他人共享工作、聊天、评论和协作。
word是编程语言中的一种数据类型，是无符号的短整型，且占2个字节。

yingyinNormal.en: And then the word "He", it wasn't the masculine pronoun, but rather, "H-E," the abbreviation for helium.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后单词"He"并非男性的代词，而是"H-E"氦元素的缩写。

yingyinNormal.en: She just learned the word "No."
yingyinNormal.zh: 她刚学会说不这个词。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll kill you. You have my word.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我会宰了你，给我记住。

yingyinNormal.en: I got "whine." I got the "b word."
yingyinNormal.zh: 我负责唧唧。我负责歪歪。

yingyinNormal.en: Liberated! That's one word for it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 解放?! 这个词太传神了。

yingyinNormal.en: Lady Rose? That's one word for her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 罗斯小姐吗？可以这么说吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Miss Matthews, your word is Harajuku.
yingyinNormal.zh: 马修斯小姐，你的词是原宿。

yingyinNormal.en: My clerks. They wrote it. Every word.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的手下，是他们写的。每个字都是。

yingyinNormal.en: That is the word on the street, dear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 道上的确都是这么传的。

yingyinNormal.en: Actually it's your word against yours.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其实呢，我都录下来了。

yingyinNormal.en: I take issue with the word "compulsive."
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不喜欢"强迫"这个词。

yingyinNormal.en: Take it and go. And remember, one word...
yingyinNormal.zh: 拿着走吧，记住，敢说一句…

yingyinNormal.en: Just give me the word, I'll splatter him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你一声令下，我就辗爆他。

yingyinNormal.en: I know you hate the word "moist". I know...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还知道你讨厌"湿润"这个词。

yingyinNormal.en: And what word would you use, Mr. Secretary.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你会用哪个词，国务卿先生？

yingyinNormal.en: Then why did it have the word eternity in it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们的确说了“永远”。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. Hey Ross. Any word on the apartment yet?
yingyinNormal.zh: 罗斯，公寓申请得怎样？

yingyinNormal.en: What's the word on Strucker? Nato has got him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 斯特拉克怎么样？交给北约了。

yingyinNormal.en: Your proposal is accepted, Cary. Diane, a word?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们接受你的提议，凯里。戴安，借一步说话？

yingyinNormal.en: They have Dolores? There it is. The magic word.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们带走了德洛丽丝？就是这个，神奇咒语。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 词; 字; 言语; 证词

word_level_phrase_info.phrase: in the broadest sense of the word

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

n. 关键词；解开密码的关键词；信息检索系统中的关键词

word_family.mean: n. 词；字；话；消息；信息；诺言；命令；保证；歌词；词句

sense_info_list.zh: 词; 字; 言语; 证词

examination_example.sentence: Meanwhile, Schwitzgebel—who had predicted no effect—will be eating his <highlight>words</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与此同时，曾预测不会有任何影响的施维茨盖贝尔将收回他的话。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>words</highlight> that have mattered are efficiency, flexibility, shareholder value, business-friendly, wealth generation, sales, impact and, in newspapers, circulation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那些起作用的词是效率、灵活性、股东价值、商业友好、财富创造、销售、影响力，以及在报纸上的发行量。

examination_example.sentence: That whispered message, half invitation and half forcing, is what most of us think of when we hear the <highlight>words</highlight> peer pressure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们听到“同辈压力”这个词时，大多数人都会想到这种半是邀请，半是强迫的低语。

sense_info_list.en: choose the words you use when you are saying or writing something

examination_example.sentence: These were some of the <highlight>words</highlight> that Nature readers used to describe their experience of art-science collaborations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是《自然》杂志的读者用来描述他们的艺术与科学合作经历的一些词汇。

examination_example.sentence: In other <highlight>words</highlight>, if you're going to make a print product, make it for the people who are already obsessed with it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 换句话说，如果你要做一个印刷产品，那就给那些已经对它着迷的人做吧。

examination_example.sentence: But had Entergy kept its <highlight>word</highlight>, that debate would be beside the point.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但如果Entergy信守诺言，这场争论就无关紧要了。

examination_example.sentence: Now comes <highlight>word</highlight> that everyone involved has finally agreed on a plan to fix the system.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在有消息称，所有参与其中的人最终同意了一项修复该系统的计划。

sense_info_list.zh: 台词; 对白; 歌词

sense_info_list.en: remarks said in anger or in a quarrel

word_usage.usage:
表达某事由某人说了算或由某人最后决定可以用have the last/final word(on sth.)。
表达收回前言，承认说错了话可以说eat one's words。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (in a word)总的来说; 总之

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 词；字；话；消息；信息；诺言；命令；保证；歌词；词句

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 换句话说；也就是说；换言之

examination_example.sentence: Hillary Shulman, the author of the study, asserts that specialized <highlight>words</highlight> are a signal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项研究的作者希拉里·舒尔曼断言，专业词汇是一种信号。

examination_example.sentence: You should write at least 150 <highlight>words</highlight> but no more than 200 <highlight>words</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你应该写至少150个词汇但不超过200字。

examination_example.sentence: He was the first person to develop it successfully into a global communication system—in both terms of the <highlight>word</highlight>; that is, worldwide and all-inclusive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他是第一个把它成功地发展成一个全球通信系统的人。换个表达即，在全世界范围内，全部包含。

examination_example.sentence: In other <highlight>words</highlight>, optimism may foster good habits that bolster health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 换句话说，乐观可能会培养有益健康的良好习惯。

examination_example.sentence: In other <highlight>words</highlight>, the vast majority of what makes us culturally distinct from one another has nothing to do with our homeland.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 换句话说，绝大多数使我们在文化上与众不同的东西与我们的祖国毫无关系。

examination_example.sentence: In other <highlight>words</highlight>, Marconi had the advantage of not being burdened by preconceived assumptions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 换句话说，Marconi的优势是不会被先入为主的假设所拖累。

sense_info_list.zh: (in a word)总的来说; 总之

examination_example.sentence: In a <highlight>word</highlight>, I hope everyone puts their studies, work and life before chasing stars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总而言之，我希望每个人都把学习、工作和生活放在追星之前。

sense_info_list.en: remarks said in anger or in a quarrel

word_usage.usage: word表“诺言, 保证”时，为单数名词。“?遵守诺言”用keep one's word表达，“不遵守诺言”用break one's word。

word表“言语”时，为可数名词。“说几句话”用have a word表达，have words作"争论, 争吵"解。
示例：我想和他说句话。
误 I want to have words with him.
正 I want to have a word with him.

word表“消息”时，为不可数名词，前面不加冠词。“得知消息”可用have/receive word表达。
示例：我刚得知他到达的消息。
误 I have just received the word of his arrival.
正 I have just received word of his arrival.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词，语言的最小单位，也可指话语、一句话或几句话。
指有特定意义的词、词语或术语，尤用于某种专门学科或某类语言中。
指某种语言的全部词汇，或某人学会或使用的所有词汇，也指谈论某一学科、行业等时专用的词汇。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 关键词；解开密码的关键词；信息检索系统中的关键词

word_family.mean: n. 词；字；话；消息；信息；诺言；命令；保证；歌词；词句

examination_example.sentence: This is why the <highlight>word</highlight> "five" in many languages is derived from the <highlight>word</highlight> for "hand."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这就是为什么在许多语言中，“五”这个词来源于“手”这个词。

examination_example.sentence: To solve <highlight>word</highlight> search puzzles.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了解决单词搜索难题。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>word</highlight> "culture" comes from the Latin "colere," which literally means "to cultivate."
examination_example.sentence_trans: “文化”一词来源于拉丁语“colere“，字面意思是“培养”。

examination_example.sentence: In other <highlight>words</highlight>, the rich get richer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 换句话说，富人越来越富。

examination_example.sentence: Those were the <highlight>words</highlight> uttered by British scientist Rosalind Franklin, who firmly believed that the pursuit of science should be accessible to all.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些话是英国科学家罗莎琳德·富兰克林说的，她坚信追求科学应该向所有人开放。

examination_example.sentence: In the image, the mother scolds the student with the <highlight>words</highlight>, "Shame on you!"
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在画中，这位母亲训斥学生：“真丢人！”

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 换句话说；也就是说；换言之

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 词；字；话；消息；信息；诺言；命令；保证；歌词；词句

sense_info_list.zh: 词; 字; 言语; 证词

examination_example.sentence: It might sound like a <highlight>word</highlight> you know.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这可能听起来像一个你知道的词。

examination_example.sentence: He tried to ask, but <highlight>words</highlight> didn't come out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他想要问，却说不出话来。

examination_example.sentence: I forget new <highlight>words</highlight> quickly．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我很快忘记了生词。

examination_example.sentence: A man who keeps his <highlight>word</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个信守诺言的人。

examination_example.sentence: Be careful not to break your <highlight>word</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 小心不要食言。

sense_info_list.zh: (in a word)简言之; 一句话

examination_example.sentence: In a <highlight>word</highlight>, family members can make us full of energy and powerful all the time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总而言之，家庭成员可以让我们一直充满活力和力量。

examination_example.sentence: In a <highlight>word</highlight>, to learn music is beneficial(有益的).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 简言之，学音乐是有益的。

word_usage.usage: word表“诺言, 保证”时，为单数名词。“遵守诺言”用keep one's word表达，“不遵守诺言”用break one's word。

word表“言语”时，为可数名词。“说几句话”用have a word表达，have words作"争论, 争吵"解。
示例：我想和他说句话。
误 I want to have words with him.
正 I want to have a word with him.

word表“消息”时，为不可数名词，前面不加冠词。“得知消息”可用have/receive word表达。
示例：我刚得知他到达的消息。
误 I have just received the word of his arrival.
正 I have just received word of his arrival.
